recipes.title: Veggie Stew
recipes.method: 1. Pre-heat the oven to 200C/3C/gas 5. Place the carrot, leek and tofu in a large bowl. Add the stock and mix well. 2. Add the rest of the ingredients and mix well. 3. Place the mixture in a large bowl and cover with a lid. 4. Place the lid on the oven and cook for 40 minutes. 5. Serve with a slaw of your choice

recipes.title: Veggie Pizza
recipes.method: 1. Pre-heat the oven to 200C/3C/gas 5. Add the pasata, green pepper and mushrooms to the base. Place the lid on the oven and cook for 30 minutes. 5. Serve with a slaw of your choice

recipes.title: Irish Stew
recipes.method: 1. Heat the slow cooker if necessary, then heat the oil in a frying pan. 2. Sizzle the bacon until crisp, tip into the slow-cooker pot, then brown the chunks of lamb in the pan. 3. Transfer to the slow-cooker pot along with the thyme, onions, carrots, potatoes, stock, bay leaves and enough water to cover the lamb. 4. Cover and cook on Low for 7 hrs. 5. Stir in the pearl barley and leek, and cook on High for 1 hr more until the pearl barley is tender. 6. Stir in the butter, season and serve scooped straight from the dish.

recipes.title: Beef Noodles
recipes.method: 1. Start by making up the sauce. Mix the ingredients together in a small bowl. 2. Boil the noodles according to pack instructions. 3. A minute before they are ready, tip in broccoli. 4. Heat the oil in a wok until very hot, then stir-fry the beef for 2-3 mins until well browned. 5. Tip in the sauce, give it a stir, let it simmer for a moment, then turn off the heat. 6. Drain the noodles, stir into the beef and serve straight away, scattered with spring onions.
